name: Saute Sugoi
description:
Saute Sugoi was developed by TenshiHanka, GissyEva, ThatOtherCoco, and FunnyBunnyJay.

The sequel to the culinary visual novel made by a group of friends, now with new characters mixed in!
-Individual endings for all characters
-Comedic dialog
-Voice acting
-Stock photos of kitchens... and more
